overview: This sequel shot in high-definition in Berlin, Las Vegas and Los Angeles stars the most sexual girls in the adult business. Fashionistas Safado: The Challenge (a.k.a. Fashionistas 2) focuses on Antonio (Rocco) and Jesse (Belladonna) after they take command of the Fashionistas company. They receive a message from a mysterious man in Berlin who tests Antonio's loyalty to Jesse and challenges his sexual strength. Visually stunning and sexually amazing, featuring a 14-person orgy, and with a music score worthy of a mainstream release, Fashionistas 2 will be followed by Fashionistas Safado: Berlin.
title: Fashionistas Safado: The Challenge
